short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Neptune Blue is a simple and fun game right on the chrome extension, with simple and dramatic gameplay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Neptune Blue is a simple and fun game right on the chrome extension, with simple and dramatic gameplay. Automatically let the plane move and your job is to avoid the rocks along with eating the + signs to increase lives and be able to play more. The game will also have levels that help increase drama
